[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.1 Purpose: The Banking System (BS) defines the requirements for online banking, financial management, secure transactions, and accessibility.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.2 Scope: BS enables customers to manage finances, transactions, credit, and secure banking.

[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.1 System Interfaces: BS integrates with payment gateways, currency exchange APIs, and fraud detection systems.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.2 User Interfaces: BS provides a web-based and mobile-friendly UI with large fonts and clear navigation.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.3 Hardware Interfaces: BS supports ATMs, POS terminals, and biometric devices.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.4 Software Interfaces: BS supports integrations with accounting software, loan processing tools, and investment tracking platforms.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.5 Communications Interfa: BS ensures secure communication using TLS encryption and multi-factor authentication.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.7 Operations: BS automates account setup, reporting, transactions, and security monitoring.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.8 Site Adaptation Requir: BS supports multilingual and multi-currency banking.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.9 Interfaces with Servic: BS connects with international payment networks and credit scoring agencies.

[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.4 Product Functions: BS provides secure account access, transaction tracking, credit management, and financial reporting.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.5 User Characteristics: BS serves individuals, business owners, travelers, senior citizens, and high-net-worth clients.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.6 Limitations: BS requires stable internet connectivity for transactions and third-party integrations.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.7 Assumptions and Dependencie: BS relies on banking regulations, financial integrations, and compliance frameworks.

[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-001: The system shall integrate with third-party payment gateways, foreign exchange platforms, and fraud monitoring systems.
[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-002: The system shall support connections with accounting tools, loan management systems, and investment tracking applications.

[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-001: The system shall allow customers to view their real-time account balance upon login (REQ-DB-001).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-003: The system shall provide detailed transaction history with filtering by date, type, amount, and business financial tracking (REQ-DB-001).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-004: The system shall support recurring payments for bills and loans.

[SUBSEC] 2.3 Usability Requirements.REQ-USAB-001: The system shall offer an accessible UI with large fonts.

[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-001: The system shall process transactions within 3 seconds under normal conditions (REQ-FUNC-002).
[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-002: The system shall maintain 99.9% uptime availability.

[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-001: The system shall store customer balances, transactions, and credit scores.

[SUBSEC] 2.6 Design Constraints.REQ-DSGN-001: The system shall comply with PCI DSS standards for secure financial transactions.

[SUBSEC] 2.7 Standards Compliance.REQ-COMP-001: The system shall adhere to international banking security regulations, including GDPR and ISO/IEC 27001.

[SUBSEC] 2.8 Software System Attributes.REQ-ATTR-001: The system shall implement biometric authentication, multi-factor security, and encrypted processing (REQ-DSGN-001).

[SEC] 3. Verification: Automated security tests, transaction validation, and compliance audits ensure integrity.
[SEC] 4. Supporting Information: User manuals, financial literacy guides, and API integration documentation.
[SEC] 5. References: GDPR compliance framework, PCI DSS guidelines, and ISO/IEC 27001 security standards.
